body: @ulquiorra_no4 The only real part is that there may be people who would commit suicide (although it's not a high probability either). But the infidelity they show here is super fictional.

Why would he jump off the balcony instead of taking the infidelity money he would gain in the divorce settlement? They stupidly recorded their infidelity, so he'd be GUARANTEED to win the case and according to Japanese law, BOTH of them would have to pay up.

Like «Birthday» (previous work), the author write fiction within his story (sex with alcohol, rape with submission). However, it seems positive to me. It feeds the reader's fantasy of «being able to conquer women by forcing her to have sex», which is nice as a "fantasy" but very far from reality.

This reminds me of my friend, who got cheated on by his wife. They have a 4-year-old son but when he learned that she was cheating with a younger work colleague, he was heartbroken and wanted to take his own life but we told him to cherish his life more especially for the kid. When he confronted her about the affair, the woman got mad and tried to turn the tables on him but the evidence was strong so he won the case. he literally destroyed his ex-wife's life, since she had to pay a large amount for settlement and they had to choose who will stay and who will leave the company. The ex-wife left because how can you stay in a place where everyone knows you committed adultery? and the guy was forced by the ex-wife's parents to take responsibility for the sh*t they committed. It's been 3 years since then, my friend never got into a serious relationship again but at least he's much better now. I don't know about the ex-wife but my friend allowed her to visit their son once a month.

Shitty story, still plagued with a lot of NTRash hentai logic BUT it does show somewhat a tiny bit of a reality in Japan about life-work balance, marriage, cheating, sex, etc. The pages about the posts are just filler readings and to get the gullible readers emotionally into it. However, I really liked art here, it's super good, things like the long stretched out sex sequences, plenty of positions, many ahegaos, and showcasing a hot wife, really top-tier fap material, if anything else.
